Draft Rating:

B+

Scott Layden ranks in the 78th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Layden's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 7 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Lavor Postell with 39th pick but was worth 14th pick.
  • Drafted Bryon Russell with 45th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Jacque Vaughn with 27th pick but was worth 46th pick.
  • Drafted Blue Edwards with 21th pick but was worth 44th pick.
  • Drafted Mike Sweetney with 9th pick but was worth 31th pick.

Trade Rating:

B-

Scott Layden ranks in the 64th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Kenny Gattison, Brooks Thompson, Andrei Kirilenko to UTA.
  • Lost Felton Spencer to ORL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Antonio McDyess, Frank Williams, Maciej Lampe to NYK.
  • Lost Marcus Camby, Nenê, Mark Jackson to DEN.

Signing Rating:

D

Scott Layden ranks in the 28th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.

Their worst signings:
